ValidationRule.description: o Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy, CPR NPR Callout, CPR Safe Harbor Call, Process ROE's, Prepare Forfeiture Allocation, Trade Forfeitures, Trade Holding Account, Unresolved Allocation Issue, Managed Accounts Issue, Bank Detail Issue, Clear Outstanding Al
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(ISNULL( Enter_Lost_Code__c ))&& ( CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "CPR NPR Callout") || CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "CPR Safe Harbor Call")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Process ROE's")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Prepare Forfeiture Allocation")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Trade Forfeiture Account")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Trade Holding Account")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Unresolved Allocation Issue")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Managed Accounts Issue")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Bank Detail Issue")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Clear Outstanding Alerts")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Holding Account Balance")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Termination_Tasks__c, "Contributions on Hold")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter a lost code until Pending Tasks are completed
